entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers after midnight. Clearing before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 12:03 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:03 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
